https://tmrev.io/movie/756470-Alicia y John, el Peronismo Olvidado 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/3eRGOr58VRUsJmWqbaFrhMndFQ4.jpg Carlos Castro's documentary traces the lives of Alicia Eguren and John William Cooke, companions of life and militancy, at the same time that it combines the history of the Peronist movement, its victories, hopes and failures. Alicia y John, el Peronismo Olvidado
